entry.title: Leg Sleeve Knee Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Protectives
Price: 19.95 - 29.95 (40 variants)

This Leg Sleeve Knee Pad are much more ergonomic alternative to independent knee pads. Unlike independent knee pads, which tend to slide down, these sleeves will stay safely in place and keep the padding where it’s needed. The featured padding offers good protection against knee injuries.

  • Made of high-quality Nylon-spandex fabric material
  • Allows a wide range of motion during activity and still provide support for the knee and joints
  • Contoured design allows custom adjustments to fit knee shape
  • Smooth interior lining with flat seams for optimal comfort
  • Ideal for running, BJJ and CrossFit
  • Made of high-quality nylon spandex material
  • Latest Non-slip technology and high elastic protection holds leg from slipping
  • Anti-collision technology protect knees against impact
  • Contoured design allows custom adjustments to fit
  • Smooth interior lining with flat seams for optimal comfort
  • Ideal for running, BJJ and CrossFit

entry.title: Kick Boxing Hand Wraps
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Protectives
Price: 25.00

Make every training comfortable and stylish with the Kick Boxing Hand Wraps. These awesome wraps provide full support for your wrists while protecting your knuckles underneath.

Thanks to its stretchable and unique materials, the Kick Boxing Hand Wraps provide an impressively tight seal. It won't budge even in sweaty conditions. It's the perfect combination of protection and style!

FEATURES AND BENEFITS:

  • Material: Cotton & Polyester
  • Length: 5M
  • Package includes one pair of boxing hand wraps and one polybag
  • Easy wrapping: Hook & Loop Closure helps you to easily wrap your hands and solidly hold the position.
  • Breathable and Fast Drying: Moisture can, and will, ruin hand wraps. Our polyester material keeps your hands cooler during training and your wraps will dry faster until you can get them washed
  • Designed to Endure: Our 180" wraps are semi-elastic and highly durable, so they won’t come to lose just from putting on your gloves. They’ll also retain their shape better over time
  • Ideal for professionals or beginners for boxing, kickboxing, muay thai, and MMA.

The Impact Muay Thai Shin Guards provide comfort for high-performance action. It is flexible and convenient for warriors due to the enhanced protection given by its high foaming liner. This gear is perfect for Muay Thai, Kick Boxing, Taekwondo, MMA, and other martial arts training.

entry.title: Ground and Pound Groin Protector
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Protectives
Price: 55.00

Ground and Pound Groin Protector will keep you comfortably protected against painful hits below the belt. Enjoy a comfortable, unrestricted fit while protecting yourself from unfortunate mishaps during your sparring sessions. 

FEATURES AND BENEFITS:

  • Material: Constructed from wet process PU leather and ABS Shell, more wearable and crack-resistant
  • Has superior cooling ventilation and is made with moisture management fabric.
  • Lacking edge with engineering plastic and emulsion designed to shield and transfer shock away from areas where protection is most crucial.
  • Furnished with an elastic waistband to supply the perfect fit for each individual’s size and preference. Fitting securely around your waist, it provide the protection you need without compromising on comfort.
  • Whether you’re engaged in boxing, mixed martial arts, Muay Thai, kickboxing or another sparring session, you can keep yourself protected without limiting your mobility.

entry.title: Fighter Kids Boxing Headgear
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Protectives
Price: 85.00

Fighter Kids Boxing Headgear provides excellent coverage and protection of the face and head while training or sparring especially designed for kids who lacks self-protection in training or competition. A quality protective gear set can reduce the possibility of getting hurt and concrete kids' confidence for further learning. Whether you are training boxing, kickboxing, mixed martial arts, karate or taekwondo, this head gear is perfect for you.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS:

  • Material: Made of high-quality PU, The inner liner is made with soft a Non-slip material. Synthetic leather is lightweight, soft and comfortable, also water and sweat resistant and holds the headgear in place.
  • Design: Monkey face shape design, can protect your head during boxing training, ensures you stay secure against nasty cuts and blows to your face and provides enough peripheral vision
  • Full Coverage: Full coverage of the head, cheeks, and chin. Solid padding makes nice protection for nose, cheek and full-face. About 1 inches padding for protecting your head and reduce shock
  • Protection-Headgear for Muay Thai, Grappling, Sparring, Kickboxing, Karate, Martial Arts, Sanda, Fighting, Taekwondo and Karate

entry.title: BJJ Finger Tape
entry.summary:
Vendor: XMARTIAL
Type: Protectives
Price: 9.95

BJJ Finger Tape will help protect your hands from the wear and tear of training. After you train BJJ for a while, you realize that BJJ is not the gentle art it is said to be. Specifically in gi Jiu Jitsu, where injuring your hands is unavoidable and you’ll eventually deal with finger injuries. By taping your fingers, you’re giving extra support to your finger’s joints and tendons to keep training with less pain.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS:
  • Material: Non-woven Fabric, Cotton - The fabric can easily be torn by hand, no shears or scissors required.
  • Length: 4.5M
  • Speed up your recovery and enjoy freedom from pain -  recover faster due to increased blood circulation and reduced inflammation.
  • Increase your athletic performance - It enables your muscles to more easily get back to neutral shape and is designed to work with your body and flex with your muscles to support, not restrict the area.
  • Ideally for young and old, professionals and amateurs, pregnant women, gym lifters, literally ANYONE with an active lifestyle!
